metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3657 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in mbsync versions prior to 1.4.4. Due to inadequatehandling of extremely large (>=2GiB) IMAP literals, malicious orcompromised IMAP servers, and hypothetically even external email senders,could cause several different buffer overflows, which could conceivably beexploited for remote code execution.

criterions.comment: isync package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
